channel.title: Comments on: Links for Thu 4 Oct 2007

item.title: By: Donncha O Caoimh
item.dc:creator: Donncha O Caoimh
item.description:
Ah, ASM, takes me back, that does. Funnily enough I can remember more C64 ASM than 68000 or x86 that I did later in college. AFAIR, I even use x86 ASM in a breakout game written in C just to make things run a teensy bit faster ..
Now we code in PHP, as high level as you can get.
item.content:encoded:
Ah, ASM, takes me back, that does. Funnily enough I can remember more C64 ASM than 68000 or x86 that I did later in college. AFAIR, I even use x86 ASM in a breakout game written in C just to make things run a teensy bit faster ..

Now we code in PHP, as high level as you can get.
